name: identifier
label: Identifier
description: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing. (NCIT:C25364 )

name: name
label: Name
description: The words or language units by which a thing is known. (NCIT:C42614 )

name: description
label: Description
description: A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something. (NCIT:C25365 )

name: version
label: Version
description: A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications. (NCIT:C25714 )

name: iri
label: IRI
description: A unique symbol that establishes identity of the resource. (NCIT:C165071 )
